content: Just a reminder that my talk MM1: A Lean-style proof assistant for Metamath Zero (tutorial) is an out-of-band youtube talk; the Q&A session is tomorrow but you won't have time to watch it between the other sessions, so if you are interested you should watch it some time tonight
Watching this now -- it's a really nice demo, thanks Mario!
And a reminder that you should track down Mario at the upcoming social session to ask him about this!
